contextId.information: The nominal adjective "evil" can be translated as a relative clause. Here Yahweh's "sight" refers to what he thinks. AT: "He did things that Yahweh said were evil" or "He did the things that Yahweh considers evil" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_nominaladj]] and [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_metonymy]])
contextId.quote: He did what was evil in the sight of Yahweh
